document_data.name: Helvaunt Lanternlar
document_data.mainbody: '''Helvaunt Lanternlar''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: On {{yearlink|1373}}, [[Waterdhavian]] [[thief]] [[Narnra Shalace]]'s first assignment as a spy for the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], [[Caladnei]], was to eavesdrop on several [[War Wizards]] of the country, including Helvaunt Lanternlar.{{cite book/Elminster's Daughter/MMP|313|18}}
